also known / sold as the [http://www.comprawifi.com/usb/802-11n/comprawifi-gold-usb-802-11n-500mw-2-x-antena-rp-sma-5dbi-300-mbps-chipset-realtek-8192su-/prod_2174.html '''CompraWifi-GOLD''' CWG-N500]
